review.title: “Very supportive work environment”
review.pros: Pros – Leadership, understanding, guidance; He is a great teacher, I have learned a lot about family law
review.cons: Cons – Would love to work more hours. I would love to engage in researching cases and background information about the case we work on.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the good work! It would be a great idea to send your employees for additional training; seminars and the like.
